NoticeData.Contents: [Improvement] Improvement of the Equipment Item Upgrade Method Each Equipment Item has an initial experience based on its grade and crafting cost. Reinforcing the same kind of items with materials increases the experience value. If the experience value is higher than the value for a particular level, it becomes that level. Items of the same class and type have the same experience required to raise the level. As the level goes up, the stat number that increases is the same as before. Upgrades beyond level 4 consume the same NCG regardless of grade. Existing reinforced items are calculated to have the required experience to achieve the same level of reinforcement. We will explain the details through the community soon. Equipment Item Craft UI improvement Move to the top of the equipment category tab position Show in the list of items where the recipe does not exist X Add a condition to display the recipe and change the order of display according to the condition [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the opponent's rune level was treated the same as my rune level when fighting an opponent wearing a rune in Arena Battle
[Bugfix] - Fix a bug where Crystal type was incorrectly defined in Monster Collection's reward. - This bug is a fix for a future bug that has not yet been reproduced in a claim on the mainnet.
[Bugfix] - Fixed an issue where monster collection reward quantity was calculated incorrectly.

[Improvement] - Change NCG Staking - Monster Collection - rewards - Change the AP potions and hourglasses compensation of levels 5, 6, and 7 to higher than before. Add crystals to the regular rewards you get each week at levels 2,3,4,5,6,7. - There is an update in the Monster Collection section of Launcher and 9c player.We will introduce the detailed information through medium. - Adding a loading progress bar UI.

[Improvement] - Improved display of remaining blocks - Mark the block and time together on the part where only the block was displayed before. - Block 1 is being calculated on a 12-second basis, and it will be improved on areas where the area does not proceed stably due to issues such as improvement of action time. - Modified minimum font size.We have improved the problem that was not visible because the font was too small. [Bugfix] - Fixed an issue where the screen ratio was unevenly displayed at a certain resolution. - Fixed an issue where launcher language settings were forced into English(en) - Fixed an issue where the tip phrase went out of the screen on the loading screen

[Feature] Nine Chronicles Mobile, a first step towards improvement, is launching on specific local google play stores. A service enable Mobile In-App Purchase, NineChronicles.IAP, will be launching. More details are available on [NCIP-16](https://github.com/planetarium/NCIPs/blob/main/NCIP/ncip-16.md). [Improvement] Change initial payment crystal quantity when creating new Avatar World 1 to 3 stage balance and some equipment options change Improving the level of wearing user equipment (adjusted 1 to 30 LV lower than before) Improved pet effect (2 to 5 times) Improved HAS action speed [Bugfix] Modified compensation calculation logic for action 'claim_stake_reward'.

[Improvement] Technical Changes - The mainnet will introduce "Mead" as a form of commission and a contract concept called "Pledge" to supply it. - Activation codes are being removed. - Introduction of MEAD - Activation flow through the portal-launcher will be altered. - Changes in the entry flow for existing users from the portal/launcher. - Existing users without a valid contract will enter the Migration flow. - Users without a valid contract (Pledge) will display a General error in the client (Tx creation not possible) - For more detail, you can check [NCIP-15](https://github.com/planetarium/NCIPs/blob/a8cf79372c35364aef5e0c8af878d65f6dbac74c/NCIP/ncip-15.md) - The upgrade failure rate for all equipment enhancements will be removed. - The upgrade failure rate will be included in the success rate. - The chance of great success will remain unchanged. - Championship 4 Reward Costumes and Titles will be added - Costume : Dark Enchantress Lamia - HP 8550 - Title : Championship 4 Ranker - ATK 500 - The Avatar Creation (Hair, Ears, Tail Combination) UI will be updated. - GARAGE tokens will be added to the level 7 Monster Collection rewards - Mimisbrunnr has removed. - Mimir stage UI and craft will be removed. - The required level for equipping Mimir equipment will become the same as Basic equipment. - Players can use the previously manufactured Mimir equipment as before. - Craft list revisions - UI emphasizing premium craft will be added. [Bugfix] - The bug causing over-distribution of Monster Collection Runes has been corrected. - The bug causing different arena results to be displayed has been corrected.
